attributes.action: Recognise acheivments of Alex Henshaw (Test Pilot Supermarine )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In my eyes this man was a legend in a
similar vein to Douglas Bader.Yet he has never been recognised for his acheivements.I petion that this man be recognised with knighthood by our present government and whilst his son is still alive to receive recognition for his now deceased father.If we do not recognise people like Henshaw it will be shameful.People receive titles and honours for far less

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
